sense.def:
To rescue someone
pomeni spraviti človeka iz nevarnega ali težavnega položaja.

seg.quote: He was rescued from the sinking aircraft by a passing ship.
The Cabinet decided not to rescue the company.
The man's shouts could not be heard by the rescuers.

sense.def:
Rescue
je pomoč, ki človeka reši iz nevarnega ali težavnega položaja.

seg.quote: The coastguard may be working on as many as 20 rescues at any one time.

sense.def:
To come to someone's rescue
pomeni nekomu ponuditi pomoč, ko je v nevarnosti ali težavah.
